entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
